useCase.name: View Account Notes
useCase.description: As a user, I want to view and add notes to an account.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Account notes are successfully viewed and added.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button in the header.

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button in the header.
User navigates to the 'Add Note' page.
User inputs data for the note.
User clicks on the 'Save Note' button.
The note is saved to the database.
The created note data is returned to the user.
User navigates back to the account view page.
